thread.title: BRIEF-Xinyuan Real Estate Co Reports Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per ADS Of $0.47

title: BRIEF-Xinyuan Real Estate Co Reports Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per ADS Of $0.47

organizations.name: reuters) - xinyuan real estate co ltd

text:
February 9, 2018 / 11:06 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Xinyuan Real Estate Co Reports Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per ADS Of $0.47 Reuters Staff 
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Xinyuan Real Estate Co Ltd: 
* XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO., LTD. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 44.3 PERCENT TO $729 MILLION * QTRLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER ADS $0.47 
* FOR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS AN INCREASE IN CONTRACT SALES OF ABOUT 10% 
* FOR 2018, EXPECTS AN INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED NET INCOME OF 15%-20% OVER 2017 
* FOR Q1 OF 2018, CONTRACT SALES ARE EXPECTED TO BE ON PAR WITH PRIOR YEAR Q1 PERIOD 
* EXPECTS “SIGNIFICANT” PRESSURE ON EARNINGS IN Q1 DUE TO SLOWER SALES, INCREASED INTEREST EXPENSE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
